newsitem.title: USA: Quebecor may issue first debt offering.
newsitem.headline: Quebecor may issue first debt offering.

text.p: Quebecor Printing Inc is expected to tap the corporate bond new issue market with its first debt offering, syndicate sources said on Tuesday.
"This is Quebecor's first time in the market," said one high-grade syndicate source.
The BBB-plus/Baa1 rated $150 million 10-year issue is expected to be underwritten by Goldman Sachs & Co and may price as early as Thursday, sources added.
The issue is expected to be noncallable for life.
